team.name: Joachim Leong
team.desc: Joachim was a lawyer in a different life but was born again in a shower of coffee (non-scalding, of course). Now, a coffee lover, after visiting over 70 cafes around Malaysia, he thought why not a map of cafes in Malaysia? If Joachim was a coffee drink, he would be Cham (mixed) tea and coffee with milk because sometimes he doesn't know what he is - Am I a tea that is mixed with coffee or a coffee mixed with tea? Or maybe a milk posing as a coffee mixed with tea. Perplexing.

team.name: Jamie Lim
team.desc: Meet fun-sporty Jamie. How she came to be involved with the CafeHop KL project actually began from what was first planned to be simple affair of helping visually put together the idea and concept for a self-made project. Now, she works on the creative for CafeHop KL. By profession she freelances in design and illustration. If she isn't behind the computer, you can find her throwing a frisbee around KL. If Jamie was a coffee, she would be a latte - she ain't latte-ing you down *wink*

team.name: Sher Minn Chong
team.desc: Sher Minn, our website designer cum tech education enthusiast spends half her time writing code and the other half scarfing down coffee and cakes. If Sher Minn was a coffee, she would be an affogato, because she enjoys being a meeting of two extremes -- hot coffee, or a cold dessert? Geeky tech or artsy design? Why not both?

team.name: Shean Tan
team.desc:
Shean is our resident photographer. Her medium of choice is film and is a filter coffee lover. She sashays through her daily routine in her multiple identities - brewing coffee as a part-time barista, taking and editing photos for CafeHopMY and Spacebar Coffee’s Instagram accounts and making sure her beloved film camera gets enough exposure. One of her many dreams is to publish a book of photographs and poetry some day. Balance is what she seeks for, both in life and in coffee.

If Shean was a coffee drink, she would be the unassuming Cascara (Coffee Cherry) Tea. It’s neither a coffee nor a tea - it’s the grey zone where she likes to be.

team.name: Phil Choong
team.desc: Phil Chong, co-founder of Philip Solutions Co. (not to be confused with the lightbulb company) helps the project on the tech side of things and is currently leading the app development for our project. If Phil was a coffee drink, he would be a flat white. Straightforward, pleasant and it's got a kick.
